DOC.brief_summary: Background : Patterns scapular dyskinesis unique scapular kinematics associate muscular activation . The characteristic scapular dyskinesis may associate functional disability . The investigator investigate whether level shoulder function primary dysfunction item different unique pattern scapular dyskinesis . The factor associate shoulder dysfunction different pattern scapular dyskinesis identify . Methods : Participants unilateral shoulder pain classify single dyskinesis pattern ( inferior angle prominence , pattern I ; medial border prominence , pattern II ) mix dyskinesis pattern ( pattern I+II ) . Clinical measurement Flexilevel Scale Shoulder Function ( FLEX-SF score ) , shoulder range motion , anterior/posterior shoulder tightness , pectoralis minor index record . These clinical measurement , 3-D scapular kinematics ( electromagnetic-based motion analysis ) , associate muscular activation ( electromyography upper , middle , low part trapezius serratus anterior muscle ) arm elevation analyze association functional disability .
DOC.brief_title: Prediction Functional Disability Subjects With Scapular Dyskinesis
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 50 year old unilateral shoulder pain around shoulder complex , include glenohumeral , scapulothoracic , sternoclavicular , acromioclavicular region , perform shoulder movement . Subjects exclude history shoulder dislocation , fracture , shoulder surgery within past 1 year , history direct contact injury neck upper extremity within past 1 month . Subjects neurological disorder demonstrate pain ( VAS > 3 ) overall testing procedure also exclude .
